ModMetaData.name: Quality Of Building Fork
ModMetaData.author: sdknm2
ModMetaData.description:
Original: Different texture for different Quality to buildings
Forked by Ð¯e6al: Added a lot of textures from other mods (which I do not use) to alter the existing items. Main focus are WEAPONS and APPAREL. Buildings mostly upscaled. Weapons and clothes altered by similar textures from other mods (which I do not use).
Quality dependant textures = diversity without bloat and breaking balance.
Now you dont need a mod which adds 5 versions of the same gun, but one gun will look different based on its quality.
WIP!
